Hiring Lead Java Full Stack Developer for one of our clients.
Type: Contract
Location: Culver City, CA (Onsite)
Looking for a highly experienced Lead Java Full Stack Developer who can drive end-to-end development of enterprise applications and lead technical initiatives.

Solid understanding of database design and performance tuning.
Strong expertise in system architecture, API design, and application security.
Proven leadership with code reviews, mentoring, and Agile delivery.
